tourBios.curYrHigh: T5 at the 2015 California Qualifying Tournament shooting rounds of 76-73-68-70.
tourBios.personal: Favorite pro sports teams are the Chicago Blackhawks and Colorado Avalanche...Dream foursome would include Peter Forsberg, Jeremy Wade and Adam Brown...Involved with the Denver Community Church.

dyn.dynBios: If he didn't break his collar bone playing hockey, he wouldn't be playing golf.
dyn.dynResults: His best finish on the Mackenzie Tour-PGA T was 73rd in 2015 at the ATB Financial Classic.
dyn.dynStats: He ranks T58th in Scoring Average Final Round on the Mackenzie Tour-PGA TOUR Canada.
